column4: in gnome i have an app that is starting everytime i login. how can i turn that off?
look in menu > system > prefs > sessions,  3rd tab
i looked in sessions and it is not listed
i looked at some of the config files in my home dir too but didn't see it
no cron tasks on this system
I don't know then,  it has to start somewhere,    check in /etc/init.d/  see if there is something there you recognise
i have one service named "Remote Shell Server"
you can try commenting it out and see what happens
but i think that is my openssh-server service starting
I am just guessing here ,  I don'T realy know how this is happening,   I'm just giving you clues to what I know/think might be related
could it be in one of the .folders in my home dir?
I donT think so but you can always check
